channel.title: Vulnhub on 0x23b's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Vulnhub on 0x23b's blog

item.title: Kioptrix 4 - Write Up
item.description: Kioptrix 4 Summary In order to have a foothold into this machine, I had to use SQL injection. This allowed me to gather logon credentials over ssh. After logging in over ssh, I landed in a restricted shell, which was easily escaped with os.system. I discovered, that MySQL is running as root, which also allowed us to execute system commands through MySQL User Defined Functions. Netdiscover First of all, lets find the ip address of the vulnerable machine:

item.title: Kioptrix 3 - Write Up
item.description: Kioptrix 3 Summary An easy machine, which can be exploited with a remote code execution vulnerability. While on the machine, we can gather logon credentials from the database, which can be used for ssh login. Privilege escalation can be done with executing a command with sudo. Netdiscover First of all, lets find the ip address of the vulnerable machine: root@kali:~# netdiscover Currently scanning: 192.168.60.0/16 | Screen View: Unique Hosts 3 Captured ARP Req/Rep packets, from 3 hosts.

item.title: Kioptrix 2 - Write Up
item.description: Kioptrix 2 Summary Easy machine, which is vulnerable to SQL injection, that gives the possibility to get a reverse shell. While on the machine, we can execute a kernel exploit, that gives us root privileges. Netdiscover root@kali:~# netdiscover Currently scanning: 192.168.81.0/16 | Screen View: Unique Hosts 4 Captured ARP Req/Rep packets, from 3 hosts. Total size: 240 _____________________________________________________________________________ IP At MAC Address Count Len MAC Vendor / Hostname ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- 192.

item.title: Kioptrix 1 - Write Up
item.description: Kioptrix 1 Summary Very easy machine which is vulnerable to remote code exeuction on samba. Maybe there are different ways too, but I haven’t tried out right now. Netdiscover root@kali:~# netdiscover Currently scanning: 192.168.116.0/16 | Screen View: Unique Hosts 6 Captured ARP Req/Rep packets, from 4 hosts. Total size: 360 _____________________________________________________________________________ IP At MAC Address Count Len MAC Vendor / Hostname ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- 192.168.56.1 0a:00:27:00:00:04 1 60 Unknown vendor 192.168.56.11 08:00:27:6d:28:27 2 120 PCS Systemtechnik GmbH 192.
